reviewText: One dvd did not work. Had to return them.
Great to have in my home when and where I want to watch it.
A very interesting and well done series. I am enjoying it and will use it in a discussion group
I'm certain that this will be exactly  what I was looking for once I get time to look at it.

A dvd set on the 10 commandments, a moral codex. Yet to illustrate the commandments, the dvds take plenty of time to portray behaviors such as murder adultery, primitive punishments etc. ... etc... This stuff is pasted everywhere in the videos to such a degree that renders them worthless.

I'll probably throw my set out. Not worth donating it.
